version_description:
• Dark Mode and design refinements for iOS 13.
• Edit button is removed, since you can delete saved projects by swiping. In its place there is now a link to quickly access BOINC news.

• BOINC@TACC
• nanoHUB@Home
• Navigation bar button for quick access to the message boards.
Fixed a UI bug that occurred on iPadOS.

• Mandarin localization.
• Dark Mode bug fixes.
• Login bug fix.

• Fixed a bug where the link to BOINC news crashed on iPad.
• Removed link to forums, I'm not sure it's useful enough to be in the navigation bar.
• You can now add the Amicable Numbers project.

• Refresh control
• Improved alignment and color of text
• NSF@Home
• Gerasim@Home
• Collatz Conjecture
